pages.text: The world is full of all sorts of loot waiting for you to claim it! From testificate villages to ancient ruins, there are all sorts of items for you to claim!

pages.title: Farming Loot
pages.text: The rarest items you can find are rare seeds and saplings, as well as high-level farming tools. A diamond hoe can till as much as a golden hoe but it has a higher durability.
